name: Lone Sea
description:
Adventure on the sea.

You are capitan of crashed ship, you need to find 4 drink bottles.

Use your "ship" to collect all bottles.

Short adventure game.

Songs used:

The Longest Jogns - Wellerman

The Longest Jogns - Four Hours

The Longest Jogns - Randy Dandy-O

Fisherman's Friends - Fisherman Blues

Low Roar - Bones

All SFX come from:

https://freesound.org/
